The Legend of Zelda

Posted on Wednesday, May 12, 2004

E3 is this week/end and I am a huge game fan myself. One of my favorite series of all time is the The Legend of Zelda. My favorite is the Ocarina of Time for N64. but I have enjoyed every title I played dating back to 8-bit Nintentdo. I have yet to play the Wind Waker as I cannot get my hands on a GameCube. But I plan to complete it this summer. The Legend of Zelda E3 2004 Preshow Impressions - The Legend of Zelda (working title) Previews for GameCube at GameSpot
